_meta.title: NSFW 2D-3D-Motion Ultimate Workflow
_meta.description: Comprehensive workflow supporting 2D image generation, 3D model conversion, and motion/video creation. Choose between static 3D models or animated sequences with cinematic motion.
_meta.author: AI Kings Prototype

base_model.name: Pony Diffusion XL v1
base_model.description: High-quality Pony model for detailed NSFW generation

motion_module.name: AnimateDiff Motion Module
motion_module.description: Motion module for adding cinematic movement to generated images

triposr_model.name: TripoSR Model
triposr_model.description: Pre-trained TripoSR model for single-image 3D reconstruction

upscale_model.name: 4x UltraSharp
upscale_model.description: High-quality 4x upscaling model for sharp, detailed enlargement

mode_3d_static.description: Generate 2D images and convert to 3D GLTF models
mode_3d_static.processing: Base generation → TripoSR 3D conversion → GLTF export

mode_2d_motion.description: Generate animated 2D video sequences with motion

2d_static_prompts.positive: score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, source_anime, rating_explicit, 1girl, beautiful detailed face, beautiful detailed eyes, high quality, nsfw, masterpiece, best quality, photorealistic, cinematic lighting
2d_static_prompts.negative: score_6, score_5, score_4, source_pony, source_furry, low quality, worst quality, blurry, censored, watermark, ugly, bad anatomy, deformed

3d_static_prompts.positive: score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, 1girl, solo, detailed face, beautiful eyes, high quality, nsfw, explicit, photorealistic, clean background, 3d model ready, solid form
3d_static_prompts.negative: score_6, score_5, score_4, low quality, worst quality, blurry, censored, watermark, ugly, deformed, cartoon, anime, illustration, multiple subjects, background objects

2d_motion_prompts.positive: score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, source_anime, rating_explicit, 1girl, smooth motion, cinematic lighting, dynamic camera, high quality, nsfw, masterpiece, best quality, photorealistic, fluid movement
2d_motion_prompts.negative: score_6, score_5, score_4, source_pony, source_furry, static, frozen, choppy, blurry, low quality, worst quality, watermark, deformed, bad anatomy

expected_output.2d_static: Professional 1664x2432 NSFW image with enhanced faces and 4x upscaling
expected_output.3d_static: Detailed 3D GLTF model from 2D generation, viewable in 3D software
expected_output.2d_motion: Cinematic 2048x3072 MP4 video with 48 smooth frames at 24 FPS

usage_instructions.selecting_mode: Choose workflow path based on desired output: static 2D, 3D model, or motion video
usage_instructions.prompt_adaptation: Use mode-specific prompts for optimal results - 3D mode needs clean backgrounds, motion mode needs movement keywords
usage_instructions.resolution_considerations: 3D mode uses square resolution for best reconstruction, motion mode uses vertical for cinematic feel
usage_instructions.quality_tradeoffs: Motion mode requires more VRAM but creates dynamic content, 3D mode is fastest but creates static models
